issue.title: Ground vehicle camera view angle unfavorable

content.raw:
As an example, you can change the camera angle for the x1 robot to point upward with the following patch:

~~~
diff -r 54f05d2393a8 x1_description/urdf/sensors.urdf.xacro
--- a/x1_description/urdf/sensors.urdf.xacro    Mon Oct 15 14:42:01 2018 +0000
+++ b/x1_description/urdf/sensors.urdf.xacro    Tue Oct 16 12:52:01 2018 -0700
@@ -84,7 +84,7 @@
 
   <xacro:macro name="qvga_camera_and_mount">
     <camera_mount prefix="front"
-                  tilt="0.2618"/>
+                  tilt="-0.2618"/>
     <joint name="front_camera_mount_joint" type="fixed">
       <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="0 0 0" />
       <parent link="${namespace}/top_plate_front_link" />
@@ -104,7 +104,7 @@
 
   <xacro:macro name="hd_camera_and_mount">
     <camera_mount prefix="front"
-                  tilt="0.2618"/>
+                  tilt="-0.2618"/>
     <joint name="front_camera_mount_joint" type="fixed">
       <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="0 0 0" />
       <parent link="${namespace}/top_plate_front_link" />
~~~
